text: Ara phira‘a'una balala, ‘he parisadabarga! Ami chara tomadera an'ya kono ilaha ache bale jani na! Ata'eba he hamana! Tumi amara jan'ya ita pora'o ebam ekati su'ucca prasada tairi kara; hayata ami setate uthe musara ilahake dekhate pari. Ara ami to mane kari, se abasya'i mithyabadidera antarbhukta.’
